titleStmt.title: Bazire–Cross 6
Pope XI
Sermo in letania maiore feria secunda

handNote.p: Ker's hand 2: e sometimes high in æ; head of long s prolonged and looped; ð is frequent; descenders are seriffed.
A reviser of s. xii who adds "&slongdes;ƿa þẏrstg"; r Caroline.
